Home | Twitter

How long before my doorbell starts tweeting and telling me stuff while I'm not at home? http://www.guardian.co.uk/commentisfree/2012/jan/29/sharing-obsession-revealing-every-detail?commentpage=last#end-of-comments

I kid you not. With an Arduino, or a little gadget, you can get your doorbell to tweet if it needs to. Not sure why this would be necessary, but how many other gadgets will join the social revolution?
